name: Weirdcore date simulator
description:
The people are amazing. If you knew how much I love them. I'm trying to understand why they get up in the morning, why they love it, why they hate it. Why pretend to be someone else? I want to know what they think. I want to look into the darkest corners of their minds.

That's why I'm here, waiting for the next meeting.

Warning!

This game contains references to alcohol and sexual content. Not recommended for persons under 16 years of age.
